moves.4. g4 d5: A new idea to get the queen or to prevent the castling.
moves.5. f3 dxe4 6. dxe4 Nc6 7. Be3 Nxe4: Knight casualty to get h4 with check.
moves.8. fxe4 Bxh4+ 9. Bf2 Bxf2+ 10. Ke2: King can't take the bishop without loosing the queen.
moves.10... Bxg4+: Another check and the end of this game.
